roleset.name: To make or make appear historical

example.name: Passive, arg1 only
example.text: Why not watch or hear [your experience]-1 historicized *-1 while you were living it ?

example.name: All args
example.text: What I-1 set out to do in those posts was PRO-1 historicize the doomsters.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire.
